glsa.title: LibVNCServer: Authentication bypass
glsa.synopsis: VNC servers created with LibVNCServer accept insecure protocol types, even when the server does not offer it, resulting in unauthorized access to the server.

background.p: LibVNCServer is a GPL'ed library for creating VNC servers.

description.p: LibVNCServer fails to properly validate protocol types effectively letting users decide what protocol to use, such as "Type 1 - None". LibVNCServer will accept this security type, even if it is not offered by the server.

impact.p: An attacker could use this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access with the privileges of the user running the VNC server.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
